[One Day To Go]

Hello,

IKOULA will launch 24h flash sales on January 21st at 10 am !
We offer a recurring 20% OFF lifetime discount on all dedicated servers (excluding Agile XXL Pro v2) , regardless of the subscription period chosen.

More information click here [https://ikou.la/bw](https://ikou.la/bw "https://ikou.la/bw")

Date: 21/01/2021 10h (PARIS time) - 22/01/2021 10h (PARIS time)
Products: All dedicated servers (excluding Agile XXL Pro v2)
Promotion: 20% OFF lifetime discount

More details on our website: https://ikou.la/bw

Coupon code: IKFLASH20

Have a great day !
